content: Your proposal of 1,100 Euro is more reasonable, and I appreciate the effort to find a middle ground. I'll consider it further. Would you be willing to discuss any additional perks or discounts that might be available?
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: As a landlord, I always aim to provide the best service to my tenants. What kind of perks or discounts were you thinking of? Perhaps we can work something out if the terms are fair to both parties.

content: Your offers are quite generous, Mister Schmidt. The loyalty discount and including water and heating in the rent are very appealing.
